name: Hedgehog Adventures
description:
HI 3lric here. 

This is a game I am currently developing in the Haxe programming language with the haxeflixel framework. If you want to follow the development of this game you can go to my github.

Also i made a website if you want to know more about me.

-- GOAL --

My current goal with this game isn't to finish it, its to learn about Haxe and get better at game development to get a job in the future.

-- CONTROLS --

W or C or SPACE or UP ARROW - JUMP

A or LEFT ARROW - WALK LEFT

D or RIGHT ARROW - WALK RIGHT

-- CREDITS --

ART - 3lric

PROGRAMMING - 3lric
